data.eml:eml: A new species of Adelophryne Hoogmoed and Lescure 1984 (Amphibia: Anura: Eleutherodactylidae) from the Atlantic rainforest of southern Bahia, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lourenço-De-Moraes, Ricardo, Solé, Mirco, Toledo, Luís Felipe (2012): A new species of Adelophryne Hoogmoed and Lescure 1984 (Amphibia: Anura: Eleutherodactylidae) from the Atlantic rainforest of southern Bahia, Brazil. Zootaxa 3441: 59-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282148
